survey_name: Smart Parking App User Experience Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from users of smart parking applications to understand their satisfaction levels, pain points, and desired improvements.

questions.question_text: How often do you use smart parking apps?
questions.client_notes: Ensure mobile-friendly design since respondents will likely answer on smartphones.
questions.scripter_notes: Use radio buttons for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: How often do you use smart parking apps?

questions.question_text: Which smart parking app(s) do you use? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option with text input to capture less common apps.
questions.scripter_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-choice selection and add a text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which smart parking app(s) do you use? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What is your primary reason for using smart parking apps?
answer_options: To find available parking spots quickly
To reserve parking spots in advance
questions.client_notes: This helps identify core user needs.
questions.scripter_notes: Use radio buttons with an optional text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What is your primary reason for using smart parking apps?

questions.question_text: On a scale of 1-5, how satisfied are you with the overall user experience of your preferred smart parking app?
questions.routing_logic: Display to all respondents who selected at least one app in Q2.
